channel.title: Spare psu pcb section of board?
channel.description:
Hi Guys,
So... I've designed a small box for my Axoloti, but to fit the board, I had to cut the MIDI IO / PSU part of the board and placed into a box for later usage. Now, I moved the board into a 1U rack I'd like to use the external PSU option. As I you can guess, I can't find the board. So my question is that do you think, is it possible to buy only that part of the board, or, do any of you have 1 left?

item.title: Spare psu pcb section of board?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

the pc board is made in one piece,
but PM @johannes, you never know might have a board that the other half died, so can give you a deal on the midi part - a bit of a long shot, but perhaps worth a try

mod note: I edited title to be a bit more representative of topic.

Read full topic
item.source: Spare psu pcb section of board?
